website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech M320's featherweight design, double-wide scroll wheel and supremely smooth optical sensor make it a worthy -- and ultra-affordable -- travel mouse.
pros: The curved ergonomics and double-wide scroll wheel make the dirt-cheap Logitech M320 mouse a pleasure to use with any OS while you're on the go
Its basic button layout relieves your fingers from the strain of a stylus or touchpad and it operates for two years on a single AA battery
cons: The rubberized thumb rest on the left side means it's only useful for right-handed mousers

customer_reviews.title: Reduces number of USB ports used; can unify multiple devices.
customer_reviews.text: The Logitech unifying mice and keyboards are awesome. You MUST follow the instructions, step-by-step, to successfully integrate multiple unifying devices to a single USB. Go to the Logitech webpages and download the latest unifying software and follow instructions. I have small hands and I love this mouse. I use one at home and at work and purchased several for office workers. Used with K270 keyboard (a small compact keyboard with good clicky response. Not a quiet keyboard. Be sure to mute your phone if typing during a conference call!
customer_reviews.author: Grand Mommu

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, smooth tracking, lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It's a Logitech - I've bought cheaper mouse(s) before and saved a couple of bucks and have them break after a few months. This has a smooth track, lighter than most and I really like that its has a special "fit" wherein the right thumb has sort of a notched area. This makes it NOT ambidextrous but I'm right handed. It has an auto off and on and batteries on these usually last me more than a year. I still switch it off at the end of the day. Great logitech product as always.
customer_reviews.author: Larkmom

customer_reviews.title: Great mouse
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom who was using a wired mouse for a long time and she would be dragging the cord when she carried her laptop around the house and the cord would always get in the way. With this mouse, she doesn't have to worry about the cords and it is more convenient to carry her laptop and mouse around. She said it was more comfortable and lightweight than the wired mouse as well. Overall nice mouse with excellent battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi

customer_reviews.title: Never worked good
customer_reviews.text: This mouse worked sketchy from the start. Mainly the scrolling - it will alternate between hesitant, slow, and then real fast. This makes trying to read any page that requires scrolling a very irritating endeavor.
customer_reviews.author: postwatch

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and get this mouse
customer_reviews.text: I love this mouse. This isn't going to be a super deep review. I bought this guy because it was the one mouse under 80 bucks that CNET said is a top mouse. They were right (which makes me wonder what a $80 mouse would do for me). It clicks great. It feels good in the hand. Other people who have had opportunity to use it have said, hey this is a really nice mouse, it feels good in my hand, where'd you get it? So if you're on the fence, you should go ahead and get it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Wireless Low Cost Mouse You can Get
customer_reviews.text: I'm the purchasing officer of my small company and I bought one for every workstation and the feedback from the users were very favourable. This is probably one most comfortable low cost mouse I have ever used. I have used a lot of Logitech's high end offerings like the Performance MX, Marathon Mouse, and the G607 and this little guy is up there in terms of comfort and ease of use. Its no frills and cheap but it gets the basics right: Long battery life, comfortable feel (great shape and WIDE scroll wheel), and responsive performance.
customer_reviews.author: Adryan

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as my first M320
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a new Logitech Wireless Mouse M320 to replace an older M320 I purchased back in December 2014 that had started to wear out but, had otherwise been a really good mouse for me. However, the quality control on this replacement unit seems to have slipped as it rattles and the mouse buttons don't always click/register forcing me to press the buttons harder. I'm disappointed that I'll need to look for another mouse again as I really like the size and shape of this one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ruff

customer_reviews.title: Works great directly on faux wood surface
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in March 2016 for home office use. Due to my desk, the corded variety had to be routed in such a way that there wasnt much extra cord left over. Still using same battery 9 months later with occasional use. Works great directly on faux wood surface, or mouse pad for a little more control as it does not slide around as easily. Overall no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: TAG

customer_reviews.title: Great mouse
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use with my laptop and works perfectly and seamlessly. Great buy, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: ... for about two years but it has never had super precise tracking
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mouse for about two years but it has never had super precise tracking. It is a little hard to click little UI buttons compared to with my Razer Imperator or Mionix Castor. I love the silver and yellow color scheme though.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Slick Piece of Tech for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Hardly any set up required! Honestly I just had to remove the plastic tag over the battery terminal and switch it on after I plugged in the USB adapter into my laptop; which is an HP no glitches as of yet. I've used it for all of a half hour and already planning to buy another for my office computer at work. Love the texture on the thumb side. Very smooth scroll which is also textured. Nice soft click to the left and right buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren25

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The wheel squeaks. It doesn't take long for that to drive you a little insane.
customer_reviews.author: ckolos

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT MOUSE FOR THOSE WHO DO NOT WANT A LOT OF FEATURES
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple mouse that is 100% dependable. It is attractive, feels comfortable in the hand, and moves very smoothly. A perfect inexpensive mouse!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Sardello

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate
customer_reviews.text: Love this mouse. The gray color is awesome and feels incredibly to use. Your hand just fits great with it. Can't beat the price and quality. Don't hesitate on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bullcity

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Me
customer_reviews.text: awesome product. It worked right out of the box and works instantly when I turn it on
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great option
customer_reviews.text: Good feel, batteries last long, but a bit small for my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Dave J Green

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the mouse and love being free of cords dangling on the desk.
customer_reviews.author: noel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit cheap. I was expecting something a bit smaller but it does seeve it's purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: SFrankie08

customer_reviews.title: Logitech wireless mouse m320 is a great mouse when i was using it i was amazed ...
customer_reviews.text: Logitech wireless mouse m320 is a great mouse when i was using it i was amazed how fast the response was also has a good rubber texture feel to it also very comfortable in the hand for those who are right handed overall its a mouse i give it 5 stars in my book
customer_reviews.author: Topsecret

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Cheap price but the performance is middling, if you have a reflective surface that's white then good luck with cursor navigation, you really need to use this on a darker surface or mouse pad.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: I tried to like the bluetooth mouse for my MacBook
customer_reviews.text: I tried to like the bluetooth mouse for my MacBook, but just too many issues. This thing is great, I prefer a mouse to the trackpad so you can sit back rather than hunching over the trackpad.
customer_reviews.author: DVI

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this mouse works very well. Be aware that you'll need a USB adapter if using a newer MacBook, which only comes equipped with Thunderbolt ports. Also, the mouse is a bit small for my hand. Other than that, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Thepeug

customer_reviews.title: I love the M320 mouse for it's size
customer_reviews.text: I love the M320 mouse for it's size, connectivitity, reliability, and contoured fit. I have a black one that is great (5 stars). The only knock on this one is that is is not all silver -- the bottom is bright yellow. I was hoping for an all-silver mouse to match a silver laptop. Functionally it is still 5-stars.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Somers

customer_reviews.title: Great Mouse
customer_reviews.text: This mouse is great. I have deployed it to over 20 people at my company without any failures. The right hand grip makes it very nice to use without stressing out your wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Ben May

customer_reviews.title: Feel's cheap but mouses well
customer_reviews.text: Felt a lot cheaper than I thought; it barely has any weight to it. I think if I dropped this on the floor from waist height it would crack. As a mouse on my screen, I can't complain, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Works great now with OS Sierra
customer_reviews.text: click is a bit loud compared to my apple magic mouse. With the current update driver, works perfectly with my OS Sierra. Only if they could lose the dongle....Dont know what I will do when i upgrade to my new macbook pro....
customer_reviews.author: TAE L.

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel of a well constructed mouse
customer_reviews.text: Great actually its been a long time that i felt a mouse move as quickly as this sucker does and "cups" my hand nicely when i engage it to move across multiple interfaces. Dell one i bought years ago feels cheap and always an issue with response time.
customer_reviews.author: Martin E

customer_reviews.title: great mouse for my laptop
customer_reviews.text: great mouse for my laptop! Im using it now as i type this. It has a small compartment next to the battery that you can stow the bluetooth receiver when not in use or for travel. This product is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: J. Bravo

customer_reviews.title: And he absolutely loved it! I got it when it was around ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad. And he absolutely loved it! I got it when it was around $10 and I think it's a really good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Akirahn

customer_reviews.title: Usb receiver stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Positive: It's comfortable for small hands Negative: Usb receiver stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Mouse
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mouse every day for 6 months now. Haven't had a problem yet.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Statson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price, nice mouse, works great. Would buy this again. Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mark e Rosas

customer_reviews.title: Great mouse!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It works really well and feels great in the hand. Best part is that it's half off the retail price.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Very good mouse, only downside is it is a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good mouse, only downside is it is a little smaller than I was expecting and feels not perfect if you have above average hand size. The colors are grey and high-viz yellow which is fine but was not expecting the high-viz yellow.
customer_reviews.author: The Mulvey’s

customer_reviews.title: Not really the mouse fault but I was disappointed in Logitech as I've had good success with their ...
customer_reviews.text: USB receiver failed to install repeatedly. Tried different methods with no luck so returned. Not really the mouse fault but I was disappointed in Logitech as I've had good success with their other products.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: not reasonable quality
customer_reviews.text: stop working after 1 month. this product is not precise and quality is poor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very good mouse, comfortable and solidly built. Battery life so far has been exceptional. Just plug and go, no drivers to install. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cleaver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent mouse that provides great battery life. I use it both for office and casual gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Kentzo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the mouse but it would have been nice to have a little case for it.
customer_reviews.author: T. King

customer_reviews.title: Basic Mouse
customer_reviews.text: One battery, so lighter then a two battery mouse. It would be wise to put mouse in hand before purchasing one. This was purchased for a client. It's all about personal choice and how it feels in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Adron

customer_reviews.title: There are better mice out there
customer_reviews.text: Gotta say I like my Microsoft Sculpt mouse better than this Logitech. The clicking noise is unbearable, and plasticky build makes it a lot less pleasant to use. Also, it doesn't track as well as my MS mouse!
customer_reviews.author: Michael.C

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful and functional Mouse
customer_reviews.text: All shades of lovey, beautiful colour, perfect size and excellent functionality in terms on sensitivity and rugged it. It's been what? 4years now and in enjoying every bit of it, would buy it over and over
customer_reviews.author: Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my Macbook. Instant connection. I like the off switch feature.
customer_reviews.author: David in CA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described. It's small and tracks extremely well on a light brown desk without a mousepad. The USB receiver can be placed inside the mouse's battery compartment during transport, thereby minimizing the chance that it will be lost. The scroll wheel has a good firmness to it and the shape is quite comfortable for a right-handed person. If you're left-handed, the mouse may not be as preferable to you. Since it's small, even those with small hands should be able to use it comfortably. Mine are on the larger side and it still works very well. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris MurrayTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic mouse. A bit light in weight.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Lighter than most mice I've used. Might be too light but am getting used to it. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hernando

customer_reviews.title: Small size.  Hard to grip.
customer_reviews.text: Very small and the textured material on the side is very slippery. Hard to grip and makes my hand cramp after only a few minutes of use. It would probably be ok for someone with small hands.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect to my hand, and real easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin Wendling

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Purchased as deal of the day. Great price. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Can say nothing bad about this mouse. You can not go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: FearlessFife

customer_reviews.title: its a great deal. Plug and play wireless connection not a ...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special which you should know by the price but for anyone who just needs a mouse, its a great deal. Plug and play wireless connection not a problem as with some you'll run into. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Bmw

customer_reviews.title: Works nicely and smoothly up close and across the room
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely and smoothly up close and across the room. Feels nice in hand. The only downside is that it is right handed only and the scroll wheel breaks easily.
customer_reviews.author: silvercookiequeen

customer_reviews.title: but mouse button is not as sturdy..
customer_reviews.text: mouse is unified, so it can be sync to existing unified receiver, but mouse button is not as sturdy.... feels cheap... but it works.
customer_reviews.author: zef

customer_reviews.title: Solid travel mouse limited by ergonomics
customer_reviews.text: Solid travel mouse. Ergonomcs limit its use to travel only on my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Haisan

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable, tracks well, easy to use, no setup issues whatsoever, and great battery life. I'm using it to replace my Apple magic.
customer_reviews.author: Paul V. Mazzarulli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: zero issue with it. use it 4-6 hrs a week.
customer_reviews.author: DWM

customer_reviews.title: I love the shape and contours
customer_reviews.text: I received this mouse when I was told I would. I use it all day for work. I love the shape and contours.
customer_reviews.author: Pam G.

customer_reviews.title: Small, simple, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Great portable mouse, I travel a lot for work and never leave the office without it.
customer_reviews.author: Addi Almiron

customer_reviews.title: If IKEA made a mouse...
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Not sure how this got an Excellent rating by the Editor of PC Mag... This is an extremely basic mouse. No back/forward button, no nice/advanced scroll features. Is very light weight and cheap feeling. If you are looking for a nice, travel size mouse from Logitech - spend a little more and get the Anywhere MX. If IKEA made a mouse - I have to imagine it would look and function just like this one - and sell for 3.95.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pellegrini

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mouse is very good, a little, just for my wife
customer_reviews.author: WEIHENG

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: Feels cheap, and does not have a back button for thumb which I use all the time. I lost my Logitech VX Nano Cordless Laser Mouse which I got as a gift. I bought this as a replacement. Pfft.... just no!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's the niciest mouse ever, and of course i met my expectations 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Patricio Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mouse for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Super easy to install. Has all the standard features in it's driver and they work well. Excellent mouse for the price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Avena

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a year and a half. (April 2015 -- October 2016)
customer_reviews.author: Lapin

customer_reviews.title: While ergonomically sound, the M320 feels a bit too ...
customer_reviews.text: While ergonomically sound, the M320 feels a bit too light weight; suggesting a cheaper build quality than others under the Logitech brand. If you're used to a heavier mouse, even if you're looking for a lighter one, this is likely not the one you'll settle on.
customer_reviews.author: FiSH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: all good...delivery was as scheduled..no delays...packaging good....the mouse look super slick & cool...getting attention from the babes at office...yeah.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: WORST mouse ever, its bottom even doesn't flat!!!Don't buy it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gavin
